description: Off White. Large, rose form double. Compact, bushy growth. E-M. (Aus. 2007 - Roy H. Campbell, Maddington).

name: Rubaiyat
description: Ruby Red with Blue veining. Large, formal double with heavy, waxy, large rounded petals. Vigorous, upright growth. M-L. (U.S. 1969 - Julington).

name: Rubescens Major
description: Rose Red veined Crimson. Large, formal double. Compact growth. M. (France 1895 - Guichard).

name: Rubescens Major Variegated
description: ('Princess Anne').- Red and White variation of 'Rubescens Major'). (Aus. 1962).

name: Rubra Virginalis
description: ('Jeanerette Pink'). Light Pink. Medium, full peony form. Average, upright growth. L. (U.S. 1937 - Mcllhenny).

name: Ruby Anniversary
description: Ruby Red with darker veining and some White stripes. Medium to large, formal double. M-L. (N.Z. 1997 - R. Young).

name: Ruby Bells
description: Dark Red. Miniature, single. Open, spreading growth. E- M. (Saluenensis × Japonica 'Fuyajo'). (N.Z. 1987 - O. Blumhardt, Whangarei).

name: Ruby Davidson
description: White center, with Blush edges with deep Yellow anthers. Miniature to small, semidouble form. Average, spreading growth.

name: Ruby Girl
description: Salmon Rose, with Pink overcast and iridescent color. Very large, semidouble form. Average, compact, upright growth. E- M. (Reticulata hybrid 'Nuccio's Ruby' × Japonica 'Drama Girl'). (Aus. 2005 - Donal R. Coe, Albury, NSW).

name: Ruby Glow
description: See 'Vedrine'.

name: Ruby Irene
description: Dark Red with Yellow anthers and White filaments. Large, semidouble. Average, upright, dense growth. M. (U.S. 2019 - Gordy).

name: Ruby Lips
description: Ruby Red with White Picotee border with Gold anthers and Cream filaments. Medium, single form. Average, upright, open growth. M-L. (U.S. 2021 - Pat Johnson, Cairo, GA).

name: Ruby Mathews
description: Dark Ruby Red shaded Lighter Red on inside of petals. Small, formal double with incurved petals. Average, compact growth. M. (U.S. 1956 - Julington).

name: Ruby Queen
description: Vibrant Red. Very large, semidouble. Vigorous, upright growth. M. (Reticulata 'Crimson Robe' x Reticulata 'Purple Gown'). (N.Z. 1984 - O. Blumhardt, Whangarei).

name: Ruby Read
description: Light Pink. Medium to large, formal double form. Average, upright, dense growth. M-L. Cold hardy to 14° F. (U.S. 2022 - Glenn & Jill Read, Lucedale, MS).

name: Ruby Velvet
description: Deep Red, petal edges have a Purplish tinge. Medium, peony form. Average, open, spreading growth. M-L. (N.Z. 2005 - M. and L. Mangos, Tauranga).

name: Ruby Wedding
description: Currant Red. Medium, anemone form to peony form. Average, dense, upright growth. M. (Hybrid 'Dark Nite' seedling). (N.Z. 1991 - Jury). - NRH - Pale Pink edged Deep Pink. Medium, peony RUTH SMITH form. Vigorous, open, upright growth. M. (Hybrid 'Donation' × Hybrid 'Anticipation'). (U.S. 1989 - Jernigan).

name: Ruby Woodroffe
description: Clear Pink. Very large, semidouble to peony form. Vigorous, upright growth. E-M. (Reticulata 'Confucius' seedling). (N.Z. 1981 - Mrs. A. B. Durrant, Rotorua).

name: Ruchi Rhodes
description: Bright Red and White with Yellow anthers and White filaments. Large, semidouble. Vigorous, upright, dense growth. M. (U.S. 2013 - Howard and Mary Rhodes, Tallahassee, FL).

name: Rudolph
description: Deep Red. Medium, full peony form to anemone form. Average, upright growth. E-M. (U.S. 1981 - Nuccio's).

name: Rudolph Variegated
description: Deep Red mottled White variation of 'Rudolph'. (U.S. 1995 - Nuccio's).

name: Rudy Tatum
description: Red. Large to very large, semidouble. Average, upright growth. L. (Reticulata 'Crimson Robe' x Reticulata/Japonica hybrid). (U.S. 1981 - Pursel).

name: Rudy's Magnoliaeflora
description: Deep Pink. Medium, semidouble. (Sport of Japonica 'Magnoliaeflora'). (U.S. 1988 - F. Moore, West Covina, CA).

name: Ruffian
description: White with Yellowish tinge. Large, semidouble with irregular petals to peony form. Average, compact, upright growth. M-L. (U.S. 1978 - Homeyer).

name: Ruffled Beauty
description: Rose Pink. Medium, loose peony form with wavy, crepe petals. M-L. (U.S. 1944 - Tea Gardens).

name: Ruffled Princess
description: Pink. Medium, semidouble to anemone form with ruffled petals. Vigorous, compact, upright growth. M. (U.S. 1958 - Shackelford).

name: Ruffled Princess Variegated
description: Pink blotched White variation of 'Ruffled Princess.'.

name: Ruffles
description: White. Large, loose peony form with undulated petals. Vigorous, bushy growth. M. (U.S. 1960 - Marshall).

name: Rulona Holland
description: White. Large, semidouble to loose peony form. Vigorous, upright growth. M-L. (U.S. 1975 - Haynie).

name: Runt
description: Light Pink. Miniature, full peony form. Vigorous, compact, upright growth. M. (U.S. 1962 - Wheeler).

name: Rupie
description: White with stripes or spots of Dark Pink sometimes producing a flower Pink on one half and White on the other half with Gold anthers and Yellow filaments. Medium to large, semidouble to loose peony. Average, upright growth. M. (U.S. 2013 - Rupert E. Drews, Charleston, SC).

name: Rupie's Charleston
description: Pink variegated White. M. (Sport of Japonica 'Miss Charleston Variegated'). (U.S. 2004 - Rupert E. Drews, Charleston, SC).

name: Russell Cates
description: Rose Red. Large, anemone form. Vigorous, upright growth. E-M. (U.S. 1958 - Mrs. R. Cates, Albany, GA).

name: Russhay
description: Orchid Pink shading to Deeper Pink toward center. Medium, semidouble. RYÛKÔ (DRAGON LIGHT) - Formerly Vernalis - Deep Red with Yellow anthers and Yellow filaments. Small, single. Fast growth. M-L. (Japan 1972 - Katsuhiro Maeda, Hanamatsu City, Shizuoka Prefecture).

name: Russian Snow
description: White with small, Red flecks. Large, formal double. (U.S. 1952 - Carleton).

name: Russian White
description: White with Cream center. Large, peony form. Average, compact, upright growth. M. (N.Z. 1973 - Mrs. I. Berg, Whakatane).

name: Ruta Hagmann
description: Light Blush Coral Pink. Very large, peony form. Average, open, spreading, upright growth. M-L. (Reticulata hybrid 'Curtain Call' seedling). (U.S. 1992 - D. Hagmann, Orinda, CA).

name: Ruth Anderson
description: White. Large, semidouble with alternate rows of sweet pea shaped petals forming flared cup-shaped bloom with loose center of White stamens and petaloids. Vigorous, open, upright growth. M. (U.S. 1964 - Julington).

name: Ruth Bell Graham
description: Soft, Light Pink. Large, frilled formal double. Slow, upright, compact growth, E-L. (Seedling of Japonica 'Magnoliaeflora'). (U.S. 1990's - Tom Dodd, Jr., Semmes, Alabama).

name: Ruth Blackwell
description: Brilliant Red. Medium, semidouble with fluted petals. Average, compact growth. M. (U.S. 1959 - Gerbing).

name: Ruth Brooks
description: Rose with Snowy White center. Medium, formal double. M. (U.S. 1973 - Haynie).

name: Ruth C. McNAIR
description: White with bright Yellow anthers with White filaments in the middle. Large, peony form having 3 to 4 rows of large, broad, layered outer petals which are slightly down curved; inner petals are upward and fluted and sometimes crinkled and irregular, mixed with many petaloids. Average, spreading, dense growth. M-L. (U.S. 2009 - John M. Davy, Pace, FL).

name: Ruth Goff
description: Rose Pink. Large, semidouble. Vigorous, spreading growth. E-M. (U.S. 1964 - Q. C. Roberts, Ocean Springs, MS).

name: Ruth Hightower
description: Carmine Rose Pink. Large, semidouble. Average, open growth. M. (U.S. 1992 - W. Hightower, Thomaston, GA).

name: Ruth Jernigan
description: Red with frosted sheen. Very large, semidouble with high petals. Vigorous, upright growth. E-M. (Reticulata hybrid 'Harbinger' × Reticulata 'Crimson Robe'). (U.S. 1991 - Jernigan).

name: Ruth Kemp
description: Light Rose Pink. Medium, semidouble with notched petals. Upright, spreading growth. M. (Aus. 1941 - Hunter).

name: Ruth Lane
description: Pink. Large, semidouble of cupped form. (U.S. 1953 - Thomasville).

name: Ruth Laurent
description: Red. Large, semidouble. Average, upright growth. M-L. (Reticulata 'Crimson Robe' x Reticulata hybrid 'Jean Pursel'). (U.S. 1982 - Pursel).

name: Ruth Lennon
description: Bright Orchid Pink. Large, semidouble. Average, dense growth. M. (Reticulata hybrid 'Valley Knudsen' seedling). (U.S. 1991 - L. and B. Baxter, Seneca, SC).

name: Ruth Norman
description: Brilliant Red. Large, semidouble to peony form. Average, upright growth. E-M. (U.S. 1981 - G. C. Norman, Tallahassee, FL).

name: Ruth R. Dunn
description: Pink. Medium, semidouble. Vigorous, upright growth. M-L. (U.S. 1983 - J. R. Dunn, Sumter, SC).

name: Ruth Royer
description: ('Thelma Sanford'). Pink with various amounts of White variegation. Large, semidouble. (Sport of Japonica 'Duchess of Sutherland'). (U.S. 1949 - Flowerwood).

name: Ruth Seibels
description: White. Large, semidouble. Average, open, upright growth. M. (U.S. 1975 - Haynie).

name: Ruth Stewart
description: Rose. Large, full peony form. Average, compact, upright growth. M. (U.S. 1967 - R. Stewart, Minden, LA).

name: Ruth Tinkle
description: Red with faint White streaks on innermost petals and White anthers. Medium, semidouble to rose form double. Average, upright growth. M-L. (U.S. 2010 - Oscar Tinkle, Portland, OR).

name: Ruth Vaughn
description: Porcelain White. Large, peony form to rose form double. Vigorous, open, willowy, upright growth. E-L. (U.S. 1965 - Dr. J. W. Vaughn, Lakeland, FL).

name: Ruth Vickers Fulwood
description: Deep Rose Red with Gold anthers and Cream filaments. Large, semidouble, sometimes displaying ruffled petals. Average, upright, dense growth. M-L. (U.S. 2015 - Gordy).

name: Ruthana Sellers
description: Light Red with White variegation. Medium, formal double form with incurved petals. Average, upright growth. M-L. (Sport of Japonica 'Miss Margaret') (U.S. 2020 - Thomas Sellers, Bolivia, NC).

name: Ruthie K.
description: Vivid Rose Pink. Very large, semidouble with irregular upright petals. Average, open, upright growth. M. (Reticulata seedling). (U.S. 1975 - H. Foust, Orange County, CA).

name: Ruthie Pope
description: Bright Pink and White. Large, loose peony form. Average, open growth. E-M. (U.S. 1981 - C. R. Pope, Lafayette, LA).

name: Ruthie Pope Solid
description: Rose Pink. (Sport of Japonica 'Ruthie Pope'). (U.S. 1982 - C. R. Pope, Lafayette, LA).

name: Ruthie The Great
description: Light Pink with darker edges with Yellow anthers. Large, semidouble with a few petaloids. Average, upright growth. E-M. (U.S. 2015 - Robert Ehrhart, Walnut Creek, CA).

name: Rutledge Minnix
description: Bright Red. Medium, semidouble. E-L. (U.S. 1959 - Minnix Nsy., Columbus, GA).

name: Ryan Gainey
description: Pale to Blush Pink on the center petals progressing to Deep Pink on the outer petals with Yellow anthers and White filaments. Large, semidouble; the bloom has pointed petals in the center and outer petals are notched. Average, upright growth. M-L. (Japonica 'Magnoliaeflora' seedling). (U.S. 2014 - Ryan Gainey, Decatur, GA).

name: Ryan's Argyle
description: Dark Pink. Miniature, single to semidouble. Slow, upright growth. M. (U.S. 1996 - P. Eleazer, Dawson, GA).

name: Rye Heriot
description: Deep Rose Pink. Medium, semidouble with loose petals. Vigorous, compact growth. M. (U.S. 1951 - Allan).
